comment: He was awesome and will work with you. Very nice guy. Not a walk in the park but he does help and his explanations were really good especially if your not a math person, this is the second time I took the class I made a A this time

Great Professor, offers lots of extra credit! Will help you out if you need the extra help! I had a D retook it with him and Made an A. He really explains things clear. If you come to class do the assignments you'll be fine

He is a great young professor that really knows his stuff. He has a way of explaining things that makes it all make sense and "click." Got an A in the class and on every exam. He sets you up for success in the class! Highly recommended professor!

HE IS AWESOME! HIS CLASS IS NOT HARD AT ALL! He gives you lots of extra credit that you do as a whole class so just write it down and turn it in. Not much homework and attendance is extra credit. He is awesome !!!

Prof. Barbier is a wonderful professor. I usually hate and struggle with math (of any kind), professor barbier helped me understand a lot. He breaks concepts down very clearly in his lectures, and if you still don't understand,   he breaks it down further. 4 exams, cumulative final, light homework. TAKE HIM.

Tried taking Stats a few semesters ago and I was SO lost after the first test. Taking it this time seemed like a breeze. Prof was easy going and explained things very well. Gave us many chances for grades, which always helps. Overall, enjoyed the class!

THE BEST STAT TEACHER EVER!!!!! I can't say enough good things about him. Not only is he attractive (which is beside the main point) but he is very humble! He breaks the subjects down so perfectly that you think your in pre-k learning 1+1
